name: Rose LaPenta
coverLetter: I am looking to trim or do farm work with some accommodations. I have camping equipment but would prefer an indoor shower and one meal. I have my own vehicle with front wheel drive. I do have some experience trimming and harvesting. I do not drink alcohol or do hard drugs.
contact: Please contact me at roselapenta@gmail.com or 267-254-6538 on WhatsApp since I don't always have phone reception.
